description:
Sink into a classic RPG, and wait for your turn to STOP Doomsday from happening! Join a group of heroic outlaws and stop this madness. 

This DLC includes 2 new colours of your game: Radiant Rapture and Blazing Bliss.

Key Features:
- Dystopian setting
- Turn-Based Combat
- Multiple customization options
- A practical crafting system
- Single-player experience
name: Colour Palette 2
